languages.text: "Тебе говорит что-то слово "Эпитафия"? Или, может, "Инцидент N872-04", "техночума"? Это должно быть связано с путешествиями Теодоры — с необычными путешествиями".
"Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."
languages.original_text: "Тебе говорит что-то слово "Эпитафия"? Или, может, "Инцидент N872-04", "техночума"? Это должно быть связано с путешествиями Теодоры — с необычными путешествиями".

traits.locale_text: "Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."

"Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."

languages.text: "Sagt Euch das Wort 'Epitaph' irgendetwas? Oder vielleicht 'Vorfall N872-04' oder 'Tech-Seuche'? Das alles hat etwas mit Theodoras Reisen zu tun. Ziemlich ungewöhnliche Reisen."
languages.original_text: "Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."

traits.locale_text: "Sagt Euch das Wort 'Epitaph' irgendetwas? Oder vielleicht 'Vorfall N872-04' oder 'Tech-Seuche'? Das alles hat etwas mit Theodoras Reisen zu tun. Ziemlich ungewöhnliche Reisen."

languages.text: « Le mot "Épitaphe" vous évoque-t-il quelque chose ? Ou peut-être "Incident N872-04" ? Ou encore "technopeste" ? Tout cela est en rapport avec les voyages de Théodora. Des voyages tout à fait extraordinaires, qui plus est. »
languages.original_text: "Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."

traits.locale_text: « Le mot "Épitaphe" vous évoque-t-il quelque chose ? Ou peut-être "Incident N872-04" ? Ou encore "technopeste" ? Tout cela est en rapport avec les voyages de Théodora. Des voyages tout à fait extraordinaires, qui plus est. »

languages.text: “你对‘荒垄碑碣’这个词有印象吗？或是‘N872-04号事故’？或‘技术枯萎症’？这些词都和西奥多拉的某次探索有关，那场探索相当不同寻常。”
languages.original_text: "Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."

traits.locale_text: “你对‘荒垄碑碣’这个词有印象吗？或是‘N872-04号事故’？或‘技术枯萎症’？这些词都和西奥多拉的某次探索有关，那场探索相当不同寻常。”

languages.text: 「“エピタフ”という言葉に心当たりはないか？もしくは“N872-04事件”か“テック・ブライト”だ。全てシオドーラの旅と何か関係あるはずなんだ。かなり特殊な旅なのだが」
languages.original_text: "Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."

traits.locale_text: 「”エピタフ”という言葉に心当たりはないか？もしくは”N872‐04事件”か”テック・ブライト”は？全てシオドーラの旅と何か関係あるはずなんだ。かなり特殊な旅についてだが」

languages.text: «¿Le suenan de algo los términos "Epitafio", "incidente N872-04" y "tecnoplaga"? Están relacionados con los viajes de Theodora. Unos viajes bastante extraordinarios, sin duda».
languages.original_text: "Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."

traits.locale_text: «¿Le suenan de algo los términos "Epitafio", "incidente N872-04" y "tecnoplaga"? Están relacionados con los viajes de Theodora. Unos viajes bastante extraordinarios, sin duda».

languages.text: "'Sinyazıt' sözcüğü sana bir anlam ifade ediyor mu?.. Ya da belki 'N872-04 Sayılı Hadise' veya 'tekno afeti'? Hepsi Theodora'nın seyahatleriyle alakalı. Bayağı sıra dışı seyahatlermiş."
languages.original_text: "Does the word 'Epitaph' mean anything to you? Or, perhaps, 'Incident N872-04' or 'tech-blight'? It all has something to do with Theodora's travels. Rather extraordinary travels at that."

traits.locale_text: "'Kitabe' sözcüğü sana bir anlam ifade ediyor mu?.. Ya da belki 'N872-04 Hadisesi' veya 'tekno afeti'? Hepsi Theodora'nın seyahatleriyle alakalı. Bayağı sıra dışı seyahatlermiş."
